title: Life: The JJ Fomby Jr. Story
itunes:title: Life: The JJ Fomby Jr. Story
description:
On this episode of TGC, Alex & James sit down with Long Beach, California's JJ Fomby Jr who has walked almost every prison yard in California. They discuss his past life, how he beat a life sentence and the positive moves that he's making in the free world! We have a special offer in conjunction with our folks at KEEPS.. For the homie's out there that are starting to experience losing their hair, there's no cure for baldness, but you can prevent hair loss from happening in the first place. The earlier you take action, the more hair you'll keep. For our folks down with TGC, we are going to hook you up with your 1st month of KEEPS free! Visit www.KEEPS.com/TGC101 to subscribe to KEEPS and get your first month on the house. Pick the plan that's right for you, get it delivered and keep your hair! See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
